translations: 侵权行为的，非法行为的

sentences.sentence: As to the ordinary brand, it is tortious only when it is registered malevolently.
sentences.translation: 普通注册商标，则只有在恶意注册的情况下才构成侵权。

sentences.sentence: Seting up accelerated judgement for invalidation procedure involved tortious lawsuit of Utility Model patent right.
sentences.translation: 对与侵权诉讼有关的实用新型无效程序建立加速审理程序。

sentences.sentence: Highway enterprises should bear the environmental tortious liability resulting from damages of traffic noise pollution.
sentences.translation: 公路经营企业应对道路交通噪声污染损害承担环境侵权责任。
